DataSourceBundleDefinition.name: DataSourceBundleDefinition
DataSourceBundleDefinition.description: Represents the bundle of streams that a user adds to a data kit.

Description.description: A description of the associated data source bundle. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

DeveloperName.description: Unique name for the data source bundle. Identical value to FullName.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

Icon.description: The icon used in the deployment flow. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

IsMultiDeploymentSupported.description: Indicates if the bundle can be deployed multiple times or not. The default value is false.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the state of an entity in a package.

MasterLabel.description: Indicates the name of the bundle.

Metadata.description: Indicates additional information that's necessary for the data source bundle.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix.
